name: Boris Vbar
description:
Boris’s Vbar is a FPS-Cooking game that has an objective to kill everyone in the area. You can craft foods into something that is useful for you or useless for you.

Made in 48 Hours for the Ludum Dare 41

ORIGINAL PLAN:

  •  Target of Assasination: this game is supposedly have a target to kill and have optional kill on other civilians but was scrapped.

DEVNOTE:

This is my 3rd Ludum Dare competition. This time I used a different approach by making it have more freedom and fun gameplay. I learnt my previous mistakes for being unfun and quite boring, so I decided in this game you can massacre anyone as you wish. This is also quite a tough week for me, since I have a test (I'm a student btw) during this week so I wasn't able to complete most of the original plan. Hopefully I'll do it better in the next Ludum Dare!
